items.title: Title
items.help_text: Document title

items.title: IDNO
items.help_text: Unique ID number for the document

items.title: Date of Production
items.help_text: Document production date using format(YYYY-MM-DD)

items.title: Document version
items.help_text: Identify and describe the current version of the document

items.title: Delimiter type
items.help_text: valid value special / temporal

cvld.title: CV-Term CV ID {CV-Term detail}
cvld.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the Controlled Vocabulary the term is from

cvTermName.title: Copyright Notice
cvTermName.help_text: The natural language name of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermId.title: CV-Term ID {CV-Term detail}
cvTermId.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermRefinedAbout.title: Refined 'about' Relationship of the CV-Term {CV-Term detail}
cvTermRefinedAbout.help_text: The refined 'about' relationship of the term with the content.

items.title: Additional Model Information
items.help_text: Information about the ethnicity and other facets of the model(s) in a model-released image.

items.title: Art Work or Object
items.help_text: A set of metadata about artwork or an object in the image

circaDateCreated.title: Circa Date Created {Artwork or Object detail}
circaDateCreated.help_text: Approximate date or range of dates associated with the creation and production of an artwork or object or its components.

contentDescription.title: Content Description
contentDescription.help_text: A textual description of the content depicted in the artwork or object.

contributionDescription.title: Contribution Description
contributionDescription.help_text: A textual description about a contribution made to an artwork or an object.

copyrightNotice.title: Copyright Notice
copyrightNotice.help_text: Contains any necessary copyright notice for claiming the intellectual property for artwork or an object in the image and should identify the current owner of the copyright of this work with associated intellectual property rights.

creatorIdentifiers.title: Creator Identifier
creatorIdentifiers.help_text: Globally unique identifier for the creator of artwork or object.

creatorNames.title: Creator Name
creatorNames.help_text: Contains the name of the artist who has created artwork or an object in the image. In cases where the artist could or should not be identified the name of a company or organisation may be appropriate.

currentCopyrightOwnerIdentifier.title: Current Copyright Owner
currentCopyrightOwnerIdentifier.help_text: Globally unique identifier for the current owner of the copyright of the artwork or object.

currentCopyrightOwnerName.title: Current Copyright Owner Name
currentCopyrightOwnerName.help_text: Name of the current owner of the copyright of the artwork or object.

currentLicensorIdentifier.title: Current Licensor ID
currentLicensorIdentifier.help_text: Globally unique identifier for the current licensor of the artwork or object.

currentLicensorName.title: Current Licensor Name
currentLicensorName.help_text: Name of the current licensor of the artwork or object.

dateCreated.title: Date Created
dateCreated.help_text: Designates the date and optionally the time the artwork or object in the image was created. This relates to artwork or objects with associated intellectual property rights.

physicalDescription.title: Physical Description
physicalDescription.help_text: A textual description of the physical characteristics of the artwork or object, without reference to the content depicted.

source.title: Source
source.help_text: The organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in the image for inventory purposes.

sourceInventoryNr.title: Source Inventory Number
sourceInventoryNr.help_text: The inventory number issued by the organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in the image.

sourceInventoryUrl.title: Source Inventory URL
sourceInventoryUrl.help_text: URL reference to the metadata record of the inventory maintained by the Source.

stylePeriod.title: Style Period
stylePeriod.help_text: The style, historical or artistic period, movement, group, or school whose characteristics are represented in the artwork or object.

title.title: Title
title.help_text: A reference for the artwork or object in the image.

items.title: Description Writer
items.help_text: Identifier or the name of the person involved in writing, editing or correcting the description of the image.

items.title: City
items.help_text: Name of the city of the location shown in the image. This element is at the third level of a top-down geographical hierarchy.

items.title: Copyright Notice
items.help_text: Contains any necessary copyright notice for claiming the intellectual property for this photograph and should identify the current owner of the copyright for the photograph. Other entities like the creator of the photograph may be added in the corresponding field. Notes on usage rights should be provided in Rights usage terms.

items.title: Copyright Owners
items.help_text: Owner or owners of the copyright in the licensed image.

role.title: Role
role.help_text: Identifier of the role the entity has in the context of the metadata property

identifiers.title: Identifiers
identifiers.help_text: Globally unique identifier of the entity/concept

items.title: Country Code
items.help_text: Code of the country of the location shown in the image. This element is at the top/first level of a top-down geographical hierarchy. The code should be taken from ISO 3166 two or three letter code. The full name of a country should go to the Country element.

items.title: Country
items.help_text: Full name of the country of the location shown in the image. This element is at the top/first level of a top-down geographical hierarchy. The full name should be expressed as a verbal name and not as a code, a code should go to the element CountryCode

items.title: Country
items.help_text: The contact information country part

items.title: Email Address / contact info
items.help_text: The contact information email address part.

items.title: State / Provience
items.help_text: The contact information part denoting regional information such as state or province.

items.title: Phone number(s)
items.help_text: The contact information phone number part.

items.title: Web URL(s)
items.help_text: The contact information web address part. Multiple addresses can be given. May have to be separated by a comma in the user interface.

items.title: Address
items.help_text: The contact information address part. Comprises an optional company name and all required information to locate the building or postbox to which mail should be sent. To that end, the address is a multiline field.

items.title: City
items.help_text: The contact information city part.

items.title: Postal Code
items.help_text: The contact information part denoting the local postal code.

items.title: Creator Names
items.help_text: Contains the name of the photographer, but in cases where the photographer should not be identified the name of a company or organisation may be appropriate.

items.title: Credit Line
items.help_text: The credit to person(s) and/or organisation(s) required by the supplier of the image to be used when published. This is a free-text field.

items.title: Date Created
items.help_text: Designates the date and optionally the time the content of the image was created rather than the date of the creation of the digital representation.

items.title: Description
items.help_text: A textual description, including captions, of the image.

items.title: Digital Image GUID
items.help_text: Globally unique identifier for this digital image. It is created and applied by the creator of the digital image at the time of its creation . This value shall not be changed after that time.

items.title: Digital Source Type
items.help_text: The type of the source of this digital image

items.title: Encoded Rights Expression
items.help_text: Embedded serialized rights expression using a rights expression language which is encoded as a string.

items.title: Encoding type
items.help_text: Encoding type of the rights expression, identified by an IANA Media Type.

items.title: Rights Expression Language ID
items.help_text: Identifier of the rights expression language used by the rights expression.

items.title: Event Name
items.help_text: Names or describes the specific event at which the photo was taken.

items.title: CV-Term CV ID
items.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the Controlled Vocabulary the term is from.

items.title: CV-Term ID {CV-Term detail}
items.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

items.title: Refined 'about' Relationship of the CV-Term {CV-Term detail}
items.help_text: The refined 'about' relationship of the term with the content.

items.title: Headline
items.help_text: A brief synopsis of the caption. Headline is not the same as Title.

items.title: Image Rating
items.help_text: Rating of the image by its user or supplier

items.title: Image Supplier Image ID
items.help_text: Optional identifier assigned by the Image Supplier to the image.

items.title: Instructions
items.help_text: Any of a number of instructions from the provider or creator to the receiver of the image which might include any of the following: embargoes (NewsMagazines OUT) and other restrictions not covered by the Rights Usage Terms field; information regarding the original means of capture (scanning notes, colourspace info) or other specific text information that the user may need for accurate reproduction; additional permissions required when publishing; credits for publishing if they exceed the IIM length of the credit field

items.title: Intellectual Genre
items.help_text: Describes the nature, intellectual, artistic or journalistic characteristic of an image.

items.title: Job Id
items.help_text: Number or identifier for the purpose of improved workflow handling. This is a user created identifier related to the job for which the image is supplied.

items.title: Creators Job title
items.help_text: Contains the job title of the photographer. As this is sort of a qualifier the Creator element has to be filled in as mandatory prerequisite for using Creator's Jobtitle.

items.title: Keywords
items.help_text: Keywords to express the subject of the image. Keywords may be free text and don't have to be taken from a controlled vocabulary. Codes from the controlled vocabulary IPTC Subject NewsCodes must go to the Subject Code field.

items.title: Linked Enc Rights Expression
items.help_text: A linked rights expression using any rights expression language.

linkedRightsExpr.title: Link to Encoded Rights Expression
linkedRightsExpr.help_text: Link to a rights expression using a rights expression language.

rightsExprEncType.title: Encoding type
rightsExprEncType.help_text: Encoding type of the rights expression, identified by an IANA Media Type.

rightsExprLangId.title: Rights Expression Language ID
rightsExprLangId.help_text: Identifier of the rights expression language used by the rights expression.

items.title: Location Shown
items.help_text: The location the photo was taken.

city.title: City
city.help_text: Name of the city the Location is located in

countryCode.title: Country ISO Code
countryCode.help_text: ISO code of the country the Location is located in

countryName.title: Country Name
countryName.help_text: Name of the country the Location is located in

gpsAltitude.title: GPS-Altitude
gpsAltitude.help_text: Altitude in meters of a WGS84 based position of this Location

gpsLatitude.title: GPS-Lattitude
gpsLatitude.help_text: Lattitude of a WGS84 based position of this Location

gpsLongitude.title: GPS-Longitude
gpsLongitude.help_text: Longitude of a WGS84 based position of this Location

identifiers.title: Identifiers
identifiers.help_text: Globally unique identifier of the location

provinceState.title: Province State
provinceState.help_text: Name of the state or province the Location is located in

sublocation.title: Sub Location
sublocation.help_text: Name of a sub location the Location is located in

worldRegion.title: World Region
worldRegion.help_text: Name of the world region the Location is located in

items.title: Max Avail Height
items.help_text: The maximum available height in pixels of the original photo from which this photo has been derived by downsizing.

items.title: Max Avail Width (number)
items.help_text: The maximum available width in pixels of the original photo from which this photo has been derived by downsizing.

items.title: Minor Model Age Disclosure
items.help_text: Age of the youngest model pictured in the image, at the time that the image was made.

items.title: Model Ages
items.help_text: Age of the human model(s) at the time this image was taken in a model released image.

items.title: Model Release Documents
items.help_text: Optional identifier associated with each Model Release.

items.title: Model Release Status
items.help_text: Summarises the availability and scope of model releases authorising usage of the likenesses of persons appearing in the photograph

cvId.title: CV-Term CV ID
cvId.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the Controlled Vocabulary the term is from.

cvTermName.title: CV-Term Name
cvTermName.help_text: The natural language name of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermId.title: CV-Term ID {CV-Term detail}
cvTermId.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermRefinedAbout.title: Refined 'about' Relationship of the CV-Term {CV-Term detail}
cvTermRefinedAbout.help_text: The refined 'about' relationship of the term with the content.

items.title: Organization in Image Codes
items.help_text: Code from a controlled vocabulary for identifying the organisation or company which is featured in the image.

items.title: Organization Name
items.help_text: Name of the organisation or company which is featured in the image.

items.title: Person Name in the image
items.help_text: Name of a person shown in the image.

items.title: Person Shown
items.help_text: Details about a person the content is about.

description.title: Description
description.help_text: A textual description of the person

identifiers.title: Identifiers
identifiers.help_text: Globally unique identifier of the person

characteristics.title: Characterstics
characteristics.help_text: A product the content is about.

cvId.title: CV-Term CV ID {CV-Term detail}
cvId.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the Controlled Vocabulary the term is from.

cvTermName.title: CV-Term Name
cvTermName.help_text: The natural language name of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermId.title: CV-Term ID
cvTermId.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermRefinedAbout.title: Refined 'about' Relationship of the CV-Term {CV-Term detail}
cvTermRefinedAbout.help_text: The refined 'about' relationship of the term with the content.

items.title: Products Shown
items.help_text: A product the content is about.

description.title: Description
description.help_text: A textual description of the product.

gtin.title: GTIN {Product detail}
gtin.help_text: A 14 digit GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) of the product (GTIN-8 to GTIN-14 codes are used).

items.title: Property Release Documents
items.help_text: Optional identifier associated with each Property Release.

items.title: Products Shown
items.help_text: Summarises the availability and scope of property releases authorising usage of the properties appearing in the photograph.

cvId.title: CV-Term CV ID
cvId.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the Controlled Vocabulary the term is from.

cvTermName.title: CV-Term Name
cvTermName.help_text: The natural language name of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermId.title: CV-Term ID
cvTermId.help_text: The globally unique identifier of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermRefinedAbout.title: Refined 'about' Relationship of the CV-Term
cvTermRefinedAbout.help_text: The refined 'about' relationship of the term with the content.

items.title: Provience or State
items.help_text: Name of the subregion of a country of the location shown in the image. This element is at the second level of a top-down geographical hierarchy.

items.title: Registry Entries
items.help_text: Both a Registry Item Id and a Registry Organisation Id to record any registration of this digital image with a registry.

role.title: Role
role.help_text: An identifier of the reason and/or purpose for this Registry Entry.

assetIdentifier.title: Asset Identifier
assetIdentifier.help_text: Unique identifier of the video as issued by a registry

registryIdentifier.title: Registry Identifier
registryIdentifier.help_text: An identifier for the registry which issued the identifier of the video.

items.title: Scene Code
items.help_text: Describes the scene of a photo content. Specifies one ore more terms from the IPTC Scene-NewsCodes. Each Scene is represented as a string of 6 digits in an unordered list.

items.title: Source
items.help_text: The name of a person or party who has a role in the content supply chain. This could be an agency, a member of an agency, an individual or a combination. Source could be different from Creator and from the entities in the Copyright Notice.

items.title: Subject Codes
items.help_text: Specifies one or more Subjects from the IPTC Subject-NewsCodes taxonomy to categorise the image. Each Subject is represented as a string of 8 digits in an unordered list.

items.title: Sub Location Name
items.help_text: Exact name of the sublocation shown in the image. This sublocation name could either be the name of a sublocation to a city or the name of a well known location or (natural) monument outside a city. In the sense of a sublocation to a city this element is at the fourth level of a top-down geographical hierarchy.

items.title: Supplier
items.help_text: Identifies the most recent supplier of the image, who is not necessarily its owner or creator.

identifiers.title: Identifier
identifiers.help_text: Globally unique identifier of the entity/concept

items.title: Title
items.help_text: A shorthand reference for the digital image. Title provides a short human readable name which can be a text and/or numeric reference. It is not the same as Headline.

items.title: Usage Terms
items.help_text: The licensing parameters of the image expressed in free-text.

items.title: Web Statement Rights
items.help_text: URL referencing a web resouce providing a statement of the copyright ownership and usage rights of the image.

format.title: File Format
format.help_text: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.

show.title: Show file (images only)
show.help_text: Show the image file on the page
